text: Chen Ting-Yang (; born 28 September 1992) is a Taiwanese footballer who currently plays as a midfielder or a defender for Taiwan Football Premier League club Taichung Futuro. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Chinese Taipei's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
